Articles.Content: OK, so if i clip anything, even without using the hackbar to allow clipping in editor, on vessel load, physics don't load. This is on both stock and modded crafts. I have one physics alteringmod, and that is Kerbal Joint Reinforcement. It says stabilizing physics load, but no physics is loaded. I will provide log if needed.(Include instruction, as I can only find it if the game crashes, which it doesn't. On KSP 32-bit.
